ext_description.message: Ads Blocker - blocks all annoying ads, malware and tracking.

onInstalled_h2.message: You have installed the best extension for ad blocking

onInstalled_support.message: Feel free to contact us on

onUpdated_h2.message: You have the latest version of the ad blocker extension

onShareded_h2.message: Thank you for choosing the best app for ad blocking

feature_blockads.message: AdsBlocker blocks all ads including video ads, interstitial ads and floating ads, pop-ups, banners, advertisements and text ads.

feature_blocktrack.message: AdsBlocker protects your personal data by blocking common third-party tracking systems, spyware and adware.

feature_support.message: 24/7 technical support in our groups on VK, Facebook and e-mail.

onUpdated_happy.message: If you like our extension, help us to expand it!

onUpdated_rate.message: Rate us with ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ in Chrome Web Store:

ask.message: Are you satisfied with our application?
